trans-unit.source: Represents a button that enables the user to switch between the different <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> modes within the property grid .
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> class.
Determines what type of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode"></xref> to display upon receipt of a <xref:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs> event.

Checks whether the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty> has changed (or gained or lost) its owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> and if that is <xref:System.Boolean.True>, sets up the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> to be the mode to switch to.

Gets a value that, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, means that the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> will be calculated automatically to match the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode*> of the owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.
Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> property.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> will switch automatically to the edit mode of its <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Registers the dependency property which, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, means that the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> will be calculated automatically to match the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode*> of the owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.
Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> property.
The edit mode to switch to when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> is clicked.
Registers the dependency property that gets or sets the targeted mode when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> is clicked.
